title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning for Teachers Integrating Engineering Education Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic engineering education concepts and experience in operating online courses
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply accessibility elements compliant with WCAG 2.1 standards to digital educational materials for engineering education.
Learners can explain strategies to ensure accessibility of scientific content (graphs, formulas, simulations) in mobile environments.
Learners can integrate subtitles, audio descriptions, and contrast adjustment features into the design of microlearning modules.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
